message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.AI

The paper deals with sequential decision making under uncertainty, which is a core topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The application domain is wireless networks, which suggests the sub-category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves hidden states and belief updating, which are common in reinforcement learning and Bayesian inference, indicating the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the Whittle-index policy, which is a well-known technique in stochastic control and optimization, suggesting the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper involves information theory and communication, which are relevant to the sub-category of cs.IT (Information Theory). Overall, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), which encompasses all the relevant topics discussed in the paper.
